Form.name: Feedback
Form.Element: Please enter the details of your request. A member of our support staff will respond as soon as possible.

Our technical department will look into your problem. Therefore we need the following information: - Version of the application, for example 2.0.1 - OS version, for example iOS 7.1 / Android 4.2 - Device, for example. iPhone 4 / Galaxy S3 - Date of occurrence of bug / problem
